sentences.sContent: Considering the strength of the opposition, we did very well to score two goals.
sentences.sCn: 考虑到对方实力强大，我们能攻进两球已经很不错了。

sentences.sContent: ...Postal Service announced today that it is considering closing about 3...

...A recent study suggests that doctors start to make more objective decisions about who will truly benefit from screening- especially considering the explosion of the elderly that will soon swell our population...
...After her unhappy marrige to a man who was trying to control her without considering her wishes and feelings...

trans.tranCn: 鉴于， 考虑到， 顾及
trans.tranOther: used to say that you are thinking about a particular fact when you are giving your opinion
